The Bottom Line

The books are begging you to take the obvious side here. The 5.5-point spread feels about right on paper, but I think there's value here.

The Matchup

This matchup has several interesting angles. Seattle Seahawks has significant advantages on both sides of the ball. Their offensive scheme should create problems, while defensively they match up well. The offensive line play will be crucial, and the team that wins the turnover battle likely wins the game.

The Angle

The Bottom Line

Public money is flowing one way, but I'm going the other. This is essentially a pick'em game, but the 1.5-point spread tells a story. The public is all over the favorite, which immediately makes me want to go the other way.

The Matchup

The key to this game comes down to a few critical factors. Minnesota Vikings has significant advantages on both sides of the ball. Their offensive scheme should create problems, while defensively they match up well. The offensive line play will be crucial, and the team that wins the turnover battle likely wins the game.

The Angle

Weather conditions should favor the running game and Under.

The Bottom Line

I'm taking Minnesota Vikings -1.5. This is one of my strongest plays of the week. This is a max play for me.
